word:
Women who possess principle, and are well instructed, will not depart from simplicity of diet at this time of all others. They should 
                                                                           14
consider that another life is dependent upon them, and should be careful in all their habits, and especially in diet. They should not eat that which is innutritious and exciting, simply because it tastes well. There are too many counselors to persuade to do things they ought not, and which reason would tell them is not the best way.
